channel.title: Ultimate Death Game [Game V: The End]
channel.description:
>This game has only one ending: Death.
**There is no rules. Yet.**
.....
_Rule 1 : Type /Join to join._ _Rule 2: Type /_____ to submit action_ _Rule 3: One may obtain an item of their choosing(Knife/Helmet/Gun)in front of them before the start of the round._ *Rule 4: Players need to submit actions within 24 hours or assumed to sit down as an action.* *Rule 5: All posts must include something said in character in quotation marks below the action.*
### Player list 1. 2. 3. 4. 5.
[Death Game II: Three Fighters](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/ultimate-death-game/53157/52?u=damafaud) [Death Game III: Against the Beast](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/ultimate-death-game/53157/162?u=damafaud) [Death Game IV: Battle Royale](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/ultimate-death-game/53157/373?u=damafaud) [Death Game V: The End](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/ultimate-death-game-game-v-the-end/53157/741?u=damafaud)
